meanings.definition: The state of being ineffective or useless.
meanings.sent1: The unavailingness of the broken flashlight left us in darkness.
meanings.sent2: Despite his efforts, the unavailingness of his attempts to fix the leak was frustrating.
meanings.sent3: The unavailingness of the umbrella in the strong wind made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unavailingness in finding her lost keys was like searching for a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The unavailingness of the old map led them astray in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The unavailingness of his job search left him feeling discouraged.
meanings.sent2: She felt the unavailingness of her efforts to win the competition.
meanings.sent3: The unavailingness of his fishing trip resulted in a dinner of canned soup.
meanings.sent4: The unavailingness of her attempts to learn the piano was disheartening.
meanings.sent5: The unavailingness of the team's strategy cost them the game.

meanings.definition: Ineffectiveness in achieving a desired outcome.
meanings.sent1: The unavailingness of the old printer caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent2: He realized the unavailingness of trying to reason with the stubborn customer.
meanings.sent3: The unavailingness of the broken clock made it impossible to tell time.
meanings.sent4: The unavailingness of her dieting efforts made her frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The unavailingness of the worn-out shoes made walking long distances painful.
